info.lead: Overview of parliamentary group's basic information.
info.text: We obtained the content for this card from the National Assembly web site (parliamentary group, age, membership in working bodies) and the web site of State Election Commission (the number of votes received). For all other information we contacted PR departments of the parliamentary groups. We received information from NSi, SD, (then) ZaAB and ZL. SMC directed us to their web site and SDS directed us to the web site of the National Assembly. We collected the missing data using the Google search engine and gave all the parliamentary parties an opportunity to make corrections before publication.

number-of-seats: Number of seats in the parliament:
